computers.name: Dell Inspiron 15
computers.description: The Dell Inspiron 15 laptop is designed for productivity and entertainment. It features a 15.6-inch HD display, Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 256GB SSD.

computers.name: HP Pavilion 14
computers.description: The HP Pavilion 14 laptop is sleek, stylish, and powerful. It features a 14-inch Full HD display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and 512GB SSD.

computers.name: Asus ROG Zephyrus
computers.description: The Asus ROG Zephyrus gaming laptop is a powerhouse. It features a 15.6-inch Full HD display with 240Hz refresh rate, Intel Core i9 processor, 32GB of RAM, and 1TB SSD.

computers.name: Acer Chromebook Spin 311
computers.description: The Acer Chromebook Spin 311 is a versatile 2-in-1 device that's perfect for everyday use. It features an 11.6-inch HD touchscreen display, MediaTek processor, 4GB of RAM, and 32GB eMMC storage.

computers.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
computers.description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon is a premium business laptop that's built to last. It features a 14-inch Full HD display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB of RAM, and 1TB SSD.
